snippet: American officials must insist on enforceable standards in any deal with Pacific Rim countries.
abstract: Editorial contends draft chapter of agreement known as the Trans-Pacific Partnership that was made public by WikiLeaks shows that many of the 12 countries involved in the talks are trying to undermine the goal of strengthening environmental protections; urges American negotiators and members of Congress to insist on an international environmental agenda in global trade talks.
lead_paragraph: American officials must insist on enforceable standards in any deal with Pacific Rim countries.

keywords.value: Office of the United States Trade Representative
keywords.name: organizations
